description:
goauth2: allow oauthreq to work with non-Google APIs

Add new flags for redirect, auth, and token URLs so that the sample
script can work with non-Google APIs.  Default (Google-specific) values
are maintained.

Also rename some flags to be more descriptive ("api" renamed to "scope" and "request" renamed to "request_url" to be consistent with new flags)

messages.text:
LGTM

Looks like this is becoming more configurable again.

Hello adg@golang.org (cc: ajstarks@gmail.com, golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://willnorris%40google.com@code.google.com/p/goauth2/

*** Submitted as da1a3bbf481c ***
